FORM 10-K

ITEM 1A.

RISK FACTORS

The Company operates in a highly regulated industry and is subject to various federal, state, and international laws and regulations. Non-compliance with these regulations could result in fines, penalties, or restrictions on our business operations.
We have significant international operations and are exposed to risks associated with foreign currency exchange rates, political instability, trade disputes, and changes in international trade policies that could materially impact our financial results.
Our products contain components and materials sourced from various suppliers. Any disruption in the supply of these materials, quality issues, or price increases could adversely affect our ability to manufacture products and our profit margins.

ITEM 1B.
